“So, uh.” You say, walking over to the Obsidian Pegasus. Looks to be a new one—its head-plate doesn't have the carve marks you left on it. “Charging is pretty great, huh? How 'bout you? You do any good charges recently? Man, I remember earlier...”

It tilts its head, investigating you briefly.

“I guess it doesn't help that my armor is kind of made of you, huh?” You ask.

The Pegasus seems to shrug, beating its wings briefly before continuing to wander around in the brush.

> Chat with Vyx.
> Chat with Dorian.
> Leave the overworld simulation.
